fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • We got our square metres and our metres square mixed up in an article about repairs to parliament. The Elizabeth Tower has a footprint of 12 metres square (144 square metres), not 12 square metres as we said. This error was compounded when we converted to imperial; the footprint is 1,550 square feet, not 130 square feet as we stated (Bill to restore Big Ben tower rises to £80m after asbestos discovered, 13 February, page 12). • Other recently corrected articles include: Wildfires are ruinous - so how to stop them happening in the first place? Critics pour scorn on Scotland-Northern Ireland bridge idea
